org.infinispan.interceptors.base

Class BaseStateTransferInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infinispan.commands.AbstractVisitor
      • org.infinispan.interceptors.base.CommandInterceptor
        • org.infinispan.interceptors.base.BaseStateTransferInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor
    Deprecated. 
    Since 8.2, no longer public API.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BaseStateTransferInterceptor
extends CommandInterceptor
    A base class for a state transfer interceptor. It contains the base code to avoid duplicating in the two current different implementations.

    Also, it has some utilities methods with the most common logic.

    Author:
    Pedro Ruivo
